duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of required PPAPs and Bulk Materials Checklist for the automotive business.
Track and maintain required part evaluations for the automotive business by working with account Technical Representatives/Metallurgy.
Collect, review, and implement customer specific requirements and/or other required customer documentation.
Assist in completing accurate readiness materials for up-coming IATF Surveillance/Renewal audits.
Audit systems for conformance to required quality system procedures, standards, and customer specific requirements.
Assist with the review, evaluation, and audit of outside processors.
Uphold safety policies, practices, procedures, and housekeeping standards at all times.
